issue.title: Rename some unchanged "Drill" to "Arrow"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are still some unchanged "Drill" in codes, comments, tests. Let's rename them to "Arrow".

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9?focusedCommentId=15155725) by Jacques Nadeau (jnadeau):*
Merged in e6905effbb9383afd2423a4f86cf9a33ca680b9d

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9?focusedCommentId=15182710) by Hyukjin Kwon (gurwls223):*
I just added a link for follow-up here.
